author: pepaee
content: btw if anyone is interested in collaborating on an encrypted mempool EIP compatible with ePBS (and also regarding Marc's conditional tx proposal), feel free to join this group, many of you are already in there: https://t.me/+EDeQOK0XdgFhNzgy

author: potuz
content: Anyway of moving that discussion here instead of Telegram?

author: potuz
content: This server is precisely in place for that kind of discussion, and this channel in particular is low volume so spam/noise is not an issue

author: pepaee
content: fair point haha, I'll let the group there know that here's a good place to discuss encrypted mempools
